text: - See an eye doctor once a year for a complete eye exam that includes using drops in your eyes to dilate your pupils.      - If you are pregnant, have a complete eye exam in your first 3 months of pregnancy. Have another complete eye exam 1 year after your baby is born.         Date: __________  Result: __________  Next test: __________          Dental exam             - See your dentist twice a year for a cleaning and checkup.
